entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
